title: 安装weex-toolkit后运行weex --verion出错

comments.body:
提示说
vue@2.0.8
vue-template-compiler@2.1.8
他俩版本不匹配 
但是我vue都是都是2.7.0版本 并木有 2.0.8版本

引起这个问题的关键是 你们曾经不小心npm install -g vue过 这样全局目录下就会有个旧版本的vue 
更新下weex-toolkit@beta 吧 我们现在会强制依赖一个最新的vue 以解决你们的这些问题

你好 还是有问题

npm ERR! Darwin 16.3.0
npm ERR! argv "/usr/local/bin/node" "/usr/local/bin/npm" "install" "-g" "weex-toolkit@beta"
npm ERR! node v7.1.0
npm ERR! npm  v3.10.9
npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE

npm ERR! weex-toolkit@1.0.1-beta.4 postinstall: `xtoolkit install weex-builder`
npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR!
npm ERR! Failed at the weex-toolkit@1.0.1-beta.4 postinstall script 'xtoolkit install weex-builder'.
npm ERR! Make sure you have the latest version of node.js and npm installed.
npm ERR! If you do, this is most likely a problem with the weex-toolkit package,
npm ERR! not with npm itself.
npm ERR! Tell the author that this fails on your system:
npm ERR!     xtoolkit install weex-builder
npm ERR! You can get information on how to open an issue for this project with:
npm ERR!     npm bugs weex-toolkit
@iusn Hello，你能再尝试下嘛？我们今天发布了新的版本。期待你的进一步反馈，也可以直接加我 760341479 具体排查

@JackPu 你好 还是一样的问题
sudo npm install -g weex-toolkit@beta

npm ERR! node v7.1.0

npm ERR! Exit status 1
npm ERR!

npm ERR! Make sure you have the latest version of node.js and npm installed.
npm ERR! If you do, this is most likely a problem with the weex-toolkit package,
npm ERR! not with npm itself.
npm ERR! Tell the author that this fails on your system:

npm ERR! You can get information on how to open an issue for this project with:

npm ERR! Or if that isn't available, you can get their info via:

npm ERR!     /Users/nero/Desktop/npm-debug.log
npm ERR! code 1

@iusn 
请不要使用sudo 安装weex-toolkit
如果提示权限不够 请更改/usr/local/lib/node_modules/的权限 sudo chmod 777 /usr/local/lib/node_modules

个人建议 不建议用sudo 装npm包 因为很多带有目录操作的cli工具 这样都会引起权限问题，sudo装了使用估计就要带一辈子sudo了，而且有时即使加sudo都没用（如果这个工具起了子进程）

如果 你不加sudo 都提示无法npm 安装 这说明 你的node是用root用户安装的（目测官网下安装包就是这样） 这时候只需要 sudo chmod 777 /usr/local/lib/node_modules 应该就能解决问题
@isun 可以看下这里 [消除mac下npm全局安装使用sudo命令](http://www.jackpu.com/xiao-chu-macxia-npmquan-ju-an-zhuang-shi-yong-sudoming-ling/)

npm ERR! node v5.3.0
npm ERR! npm  v3.10.6

npm ERR! You can get information on how to open an issue for this project with:

npm ERR! Or if that isn't available, you can get their info via:

npm ERR! There is likely additional logging output above.

npm ERR! Please include the following file with any support request:
npm ERR!     /Users/youzehong/npm-debug.log
npm ERR! code 1

body:
/usr/local/lib/node_modules/weex-toolkit/node_modules/vue-template-compiler/index.js:8
  throw new Error(
  ^

Error:

Vue packages version mismatch:

- vue@2.0.8
- vue-template-compiler@2.1.8

This may cause things to work incorrectly. Make sure to use the same version for both.
If you are using vue-loader@>=10.0, simply update vue-template-compiler.
If you are using vue-loader@<10.0 or vueify, re-installing vue-loader/vueify should bump vue-template-compiler to the latest.
